alert.note: Alert for Houghton; Keweenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 16 at 4:18AM EST until December 17 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...A light glaze of ice possible, followed by lake effect snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph leading to widespread blowing snow. * WHERE...Keweenaw and Northern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility this afternoon and evening and could lead to near-blizzard conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some freezing drizzle is expected this morning before precipitation changes over to snow, but due to the warm temperatures the past few days, any ice accumulation is expected to be minor.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
